verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H413>Unto<s%> thee will I <S%H7121>cry,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H6697>rock;<s%> be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H4480>to<s%> me: <S%H6435>lest,<s%> if thou be <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H4480>to<s%> me, I become <S%H4911>like<s%> <S%H5973><s%> them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications,<s%> when I <S%H7768>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, when I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1687>oracle.<s%>

Draw <S%H4900><s%> me <S%H408>not<s%> away <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> which <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H5973>to<s%> their <S%H7453>neighbors,<s%> but <S%H7451>mischief<s%> is in their <S%H3824>hearts.<s%>

Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to their <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> and according to the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>endeavors:<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them after the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H7725>render<s%> to them their <S%H1576>desert.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H995>regard<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6468>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> nor the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> he shall <S%H2040>destroy<s%> them, and <S%H3808>not<s%> build them <S%H1129>up.<s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H4043>shield;<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H982>trusted<s%> in him, and I am <S%H5826>helped:<s%> therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> greatly <S%H5937>rejoiceth;<s%> and with my <S%H4480>song<s%> <S%H7892><s%> will I <S%H3034>praise<s%> him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is their <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H3444>saving<s%> <S%H4581>strength<s%> of his <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> them also, and lift them <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
